text: Nörber by Wilhelm Kuntzemüller. Thomas Nörber (19 December 1846 in Waldstetten – 27 July 1920 in Freiburg im Breisgau) was a German Roman Catholic clergyman. From 1898 until his death he served as Archbishop of Freiburg. ==Sources== * Category:Archbishops of Freiburg Category:1920 deaths Category:1846 births Category:People from Neckar-Odenwald-Kreis
title: Thomas Nörber
